MS.S: PS Script Analyzer Custom Rules for the DSC Community standards

# Changelog_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),_x000D__x000A_and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## [Unreleased]_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fix issue with DSC composite resources._x000D__x000A_- Fix issues with LF by hashtable check._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Create new module out of the nested one from DscResource.tests_x000D__x000A_- Used the DSC custom rules from this built module to apply to its own source_x000D__x000A_- Suggested corrections for keyword check_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Performance improvement on QA tests_x000D__x000A_- Excluded Help Quality for now
PS Script Analyzer Custom Rules for the DSC Community standards

# Changelog_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),_x000D__x000A_and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## [Unreleased]_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fix issue with DSC composite resources._x000D__x000A_- Fix issues with LF by hashtable check._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Create new module out of the nested one from DscResource.tests_x000D__x000A_- Used the DSC custom rules from this built module to apply to its own source_x000D__x000A_- Suggested corrections for keyword check_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Performance improvement on QA tests_x000D__x000A_- Excluded Help Quality for now
